cox.interpretation: HR < 1 means HIGH DDR_bin = LOWER death risk = LONGER survival

conclusion: ORTHOGONAL VALIDATION PASSED. DDR_bin predicts overall survival (p=0.013) even though it did not discriminate platinum response labels (AUROC=0.517). This is publication-grade evidence for prognostic value.
manuscript_claim: DDR_bin predicted overall survival with HR = 0.62 (95% CI: 0.42-0.90, p = 0.013). Patients with high DDR_bin had median OS of 68.9 vs 51.0 months (Δ = 17.9 months).
